verses.text: And it came to pass in the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w eightieth|strong="H8084"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* after the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* were come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, in the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Solomon’s|strong="H8010"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, in the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Zif|strong="H2099"\w*, which \add is\add* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, that he began to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 6.1 \ft began…: Heb. built\f*

And the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* which \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof \add was\add* \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* thereof \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \add cubits\add*, and the \w height|strong="H6967"\w* thereof \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

And the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \add was\add* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof, according to the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; \add and\add* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \add was\add* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* thereof before the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

And for the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w windows|strong="H2474"\w* of \w narrow|strong="H0331"\w* \w lights|strong="H8261"\w*.\f + \fr 6.4 \ft of…: or, broad within, and narrow without: or, skewed and closed\f*

¶ And against the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* he \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w chambers|strong="H3326"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, \add against\add* the \w walls|strong="H7023"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, \add both\add* of the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* and of the \w oracle|strong="H1687"\w*: and he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w chambers|strong="H6763"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*:\f + \fr 6.5 \ft against the wall: or, upon, or, joining to the wall\f*\f + \fr 6.5 \ft built chambers: Heb. built floors\f*\f + \fr 6.5 \ft made chambers: Heb. made ribs\f*

The \w nethermost|strong="H8481"\w* \w chamber|strong="H3326"\w* \add was\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w broad|strong="H7341"\w*, and the \w middle|strong="H8484"\w* \add was\add* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w broad|strong="H7341"\w*, and the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \add was\add* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w broad|strong="H7341"\w*: for without \add in the wall\add* \w of|strong="H2351"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* he \w made|strong="H5414"\w* narrowed \w rests|strong="H4052"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, that \add the beams\add* should not be \w fastened|strong="H0270"\w* in the \w walls|strong="H7023"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 6.6 \ft narrowed…: Heb. narrowings, or, rebatements\f*

And the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, when it was in \w building|strong="H1129"\w*, was \w built|strong="H1129"\w* of \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* made \w ready|strong="H8003"\w* before it was \w brought|strong="H4551"\w* thither: so that there was neither \w hammer|strong="H4717"\w* nor \w axe|strong="H1631"\w* \add nor\add* any \w tool|strong="H3627"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, while it was in \w building|strong="H1129"\w*.

The \w door|strong="H6607"\w* for the \w middle|strong="H8484"\w* \w chamber|strong="H6763"\w* \add was\add* in the \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: and they went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* with winding \w stairs|strong="H3883"\w* into the \w middle|strong="H8484"\w* \add chamber\add*, and out of the \w middle|strong="H8484"\w* into the \w third|strong="H7992"\w*.\f + \fr 6.8 \ft side: Heb. shoulder\f*

So he \w built|strong="H1129"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* it; and \w covered|strong="H5603"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* with \w beams|strong="H1356"\w* and \w boards|strong="H7713"\w* of \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w*.\f + \fr 6.9 \ft with…: or, the vaultbeams and the panellings with cedar\f*

And \add then\add* he \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w chambers|strong="H3326"\w* against all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w high|strong="H6967"\w*: and they \w rested|strong="H0270"\w* on the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \add with\add* \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* of \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w*.
¶ And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came to \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\add Concerning\add* this \w house|strong="H1004"\w* which thou art in \w building|strong="H1129"\w*, if thou wilt \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, and \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* all my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in them; then will I \w perform|strong="H6965"\w* my \w word|strong="H1697"\w* with thee, which I \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*:

And I will \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and will not \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
So \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* it.

And he \w built|strong="H1129"\w* the \w walls|strong="H7023"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w within|strong="H1004"\w* with \w boards|strong="H6763"\w* of \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w*, both the \w floor|strong="H7172"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and the \w walls|strong="H7023"\w* of the \w cieling|strong="H5604"\w*: \add and\add* he \w covered|strong="H6823"\w* \add them\add* on the \w inside|strong="H1004"\w* with \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w covered|strong="H6823"\w* the \w floor|strong="H7172"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* with \w planks|strong="H6763"\w* of \w fir|strong="H1265"\w*.\f + \fr 6.15 \ft both…: or, from the floor of the house unto the walls, etc\f*

And he \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* on the \w sides|strong="H3411"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w both|strong="H4480"\w* the \w floor|strong="H7172"\w* and the \w walls|strong="H7023"\w* with \w boards|strong="H6763"\w* of \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w*: he even \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \add them\add* for it \w within|strong="H1004"\w*, \add even\add* for the \w oracle|strong="H1687"\w*, \add even\add* for the \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add*.
And the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, that \add is\add*, the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* \w before|strong="H3942"\w* it, was \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \add long\add*.

And the \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w within|strong="H6441"\w* \add was\add* \w carved|strong="H4734"\w* with \w knops|strong="H6497"\w* and \w open|strong="H6362"\w* \w flowers|strong="H6731"\w*: all \add was\add* \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w*; there was no \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*.\f + \fr 6.18 \ft knops: or, gourds\f*\f + \fr 6.18 \ft open: Heb. openings of\f*

And the \w oracle|strong="H1687"\w* he \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w within|strong="H6441"\w*, to \w set|strong="H5414"\w* there the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And the \w oracle|strong="H1687"\w* in the \w forepart|strong="H6440"\w* \add was\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* in \w length|strong="H0753"\w*, and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* in \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w*, and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* in the \w height|strong="H6967"\w* thereof: and he \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* it with \w pure|strong="H5462"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*; and \add so\add* \w covered|strong="H6823"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \add which was of\add* \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w*.\f + \fr 6.20 \ft pure: Heb. shut up\f*

So \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w within|strong="H6441"\w* with \w pure|strong="H5462"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: and he made a \w partition|strong="H5674"\w* by the \w chains|strong="H7572"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w oracle|strong="H1687"\w*; and he \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* it with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

And the whole \w house|strong="H1004"\w* he \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, until he had \w finished|strong="H8552"\w* all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: also the whole \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* that \add was\add* by the \w oracle|strong="H1687"\w* he \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

¶ And within the \w oracle|strong="H1687"\w* he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* \add of\add* \w olive|strong="H8081"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, \add each\add* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w high|strong="H6967"\w*.\f + \fr 6.23 \ft olive: or, oily: Heb. trees of oil\f*

And \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \add was\add* the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w wing|strong="H3671"\w* of the \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w*, and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w wing|strong="H3671"\w* of the \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w*: from the uttermost \w part|strong="H7098"\w* of the one \w wing|strong="H3671"\w* unto the uttermost \w part|strong="H7098"\w* of the \w other|strong="H3671"\w* \add were\add* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

And the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w* \add was\add* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*: \w both|strong="H8147"\w* the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* \add were\add* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w measure|strong="H4060"\w* and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w size|strong="H7095"\w*.

The \w height|strong="H6967"\w* of the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w* \add was\add* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and so \add was it\add* of the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w*.

And he \w set|strong="H5414"\w* the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* \w within|strong="H8432"\w* the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: and they stretched \w forth|strong="H6566"\w* the \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* of the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w*, so that the \w wing|strong="H3671"\w* of the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* the \add one\add* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*, and the \w wing|strong="H3671"\w* of the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w* \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*; and their \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* \w one|strong="H3671"\w* \w another|strong="H3671"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 6.27 \ft they…: or, the cherubims stretched forth their wings\f*
And he \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

And he \w carved|strong="H7049"\w* all the \w walls|strong="H7023"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* round \w about|strong="H4524"\w* with \w carved|strong="H6603"\w* \w figures|strong="H4734"\w* of \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* and palm \w trees|strong="H8561"\w* and \w open|strong="H6362"\w* \w flowers|strong="H6731"\w*, \w within|strong="H6441"\w* and \w without|strong="H2435"\w*.\f + \fr 6.29 \ft open flowers: Heb. openings of flowers\f*
And the \w floor|strong="H7172"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* he \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w within|strong="H6441"\w* and \w without|strong="H2435"\w*.

¶ And for the \w entering|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w oracle|strong="H1687"\w* he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* \add of\add* \w olive|strong="H8081"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*: the \w lintel|strong="H0352"\w* \add and\add* side \w posts|strong="H4201"\w* \add were\add* a fifth \w part|strong="H2549"\w* \add of the wall\add*.\f + \fr 6.31 \ft a fifth…: or, fivesquare\f*

The \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* also \add were of\add* \w olive|strong="H8081"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*; and he \w carved|strong="H7049"\w* upon them \w carvings|strong="H4734"\w* of \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* and palm \w trees|strong="H8561"\w* and \w open|strong="H6362"\w* \w flowers|strong="H6731"\w*, and \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* \add them\add* with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w spread|strong="H7286"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* upon the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w*, and upon the palm \w trees|strong="H8561"\w*.\f + \fr 6.32 \ft two…: or, leaves of the doors\f*\f + \fr 6.32 \ft open flowers: Heb. openings of flowers\f*

So also \w made|strong="H6213"\w* he for the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* \w posts|strong="H4201"\w* \add of\add* \w olive|strong="H8081"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, a fourth \w part|strong="H7243"\w* \add of the wall\add*.\f + \fr 6.33 \ft a fourth…: or, foursquare\f*

And the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* \add were of\add* \w fir|strong="H1265"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*: the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w leaves|strong="H6763"\w* of the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w door|strong="H1817"\w* \add were\add* \w folding|strong="H1550"\w*, and the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w leaves|strong="H7050"\w* of the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w door|strong="H1817"\w* \add were\add* \w folding|strong="H1550"\w*.

And he \w carved|strong="H7049"\w* \add thereon\add* \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* and palm \w trees|strong="H8561"\w* and \w open|strong="H6362"\w* \w flowers|strong="H6731"\w*: and \w covered|strong="H6823"\w* \add them\add* with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w fitted|strong="H3474"\w* upon the carved \w work|strong="H2707"\w*.

¶ And he \w built|strong="H1129"\w* the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* with \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w rows|strong="H2905"\w* of hewed \w stone|strong="H1496"\w*, and a \w row|strong="H2905"\w* of \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* \w beams|strong="H3773"\w*.

¶ In the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* was the \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w laid|strong="H3245"\w*, in the \w month|strong="H3391"\w* \w Zif|strong="H2099"\w*:

And in the \w eleventh|strong="H0259"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, in the \w month|strong="H3391"\w* \w Bul|strong="H0945"\w*, which \add is\add* the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, was the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* throughout all the \w parts|strong="H1697"\w* thereof, and according to all the \w fashion|strong="H4941"\w* of it. So was he \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w building|strong="H1129"\w* it.\f + \fr 6.38 \ft throughout…: or, with all the parts thereof, and with all the ordinances thereof\f*
